overview: 2004-2005 : A number of European riders in their quest of action. On the menu: more & more diversity: freeride trip to Japan, Canada, Switzerland, Alaska. The USA freestyle Tour with the TOP French, Hot spots in La Clusaz !!! With Aurelien Ducroz, Thomas Diet, Phil Meier, Loic Collomb Patton, Mathias Wexcteen, Flo Orley... A mix of free ride, freestyle, freestyle back country & atmospheres that reflect a long season full of exploits !
tagline: A mix of freeride, freestyle, freestyle backcountry & atmospheres that reflect a long season full of exploits !
title: Barcode A Ski & Snowboard Movie
